TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlTriggerAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class SqlTriggerAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class SqlTriggerAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 用於將組件中的方法定義標記為觸發程序 (Trigger)。

span.span: Used to mark a method definition in an assembly as a trigger in SQL Server.

summary.span: 該屬性 (Attribute) 上的屬性 (Property) 反映使用 SQL Server 註冊型別時使用的實體屬性 (Attribute)。

span.span: The properties on the attribute reflect the physical attributes used when the type is registered with SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關 CLR 觸發程序和範例，請參閱 「 CLR 觸發程序 「 在 SQL Server 2005 線上叢書 》。See "CLR Triggers" in SQL Server 2005 Books Online for more information on CLR triggers and examples. ## Examples 下列範例所示指定觸發程序及目標資料表中，會引發觸發程序事件的名稱。The following example shows the specifying the name of the trigger, the target table, and the event that will fire the trigger. 請參閱完整的觸發程序範例。See for the full trigger example. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlTriggerAttribute Sample/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 組件中方法定義上的屬性，用於將方法在 SQL Server 中標記為觸發程序。

span.span: An attribute on a method definition in an assembly, used to mark the method as a trigger in SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列範例會指定啟動觸發程序時，會藉由更新現有的資料 (`UPDATE`) 在資料表中`authors`。The following example specifies that the trigger is activated by updating existing data (`UPDATE`) in the table `authors`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Trigger1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Trigger1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Event { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Event : string with get, set

summary.span: 觸發程序的類型，以及何種資料操作語言 (DML) 動作會啟動觸發程序。

span.span: The type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.

value.span: 值，表示觸發程序的類型，以及何種資料操作語言 (DML) 動作會啟動觸發程序。

span.span: A value representing the type of trigger and what data manipulation language (DML) action activates the trigger.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟動觸發程序的 DML 動作可能是 UPDATE、 DELETE 或 INSERT 動作。The DML action that activates the trigger could be an UPDATE, a DELETE, or an INSERT action. 觸發程序的類型可以是 AFTER 或 INSTEAD OF。The type of the trigger can be AFTER or INSTEAD OF. 指定觸發程序類型是相同之後，指定。Specifying FOR for the trigger type is the same as specifying AFTER. 屬性是必要項。The property is required.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Name : string with get, set

value.span: 值，表示觸發程序的名稱。

span.span: A value representing the name of the trigger.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Target : string with get, set

summary.span: 觸發程序套用至的資料表。

span.span: The table to which the trigger applies.

value.span: 表示資料表名稱的 值。

span.span: A value representing the table name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是必要項。The property is required. 下列範例會指定觸發程序會使用名稱來參考`trig_onpubinsert`。The following example specifies that the trigger is referenced by using the name `trig_onpubinsert`. 啟動觸發程序加入新資料 (`INSERT`) 資料表`publishers`。The trigger is activated by adding new data (`INSERT`) to the table `publishers`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[VbRaddataSQLObjects#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/CS/Trigger1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[VbRaddataSQLObjects#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbRaddataSQLObjects/VB/Trigger1.vb#9)]
